gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels today is expected to be sunny with an average temperature of 21.9°C, reaching a high of 26°C and dropping to a low of 17°C. Meteoblue indicates a slightly cooler day with a high of 73°F (about 22.8°C). No chances of rain forecasted, making it a perfect day to enjoy a café terrace.
